title: Case May Unearth Secrets of Epstein
itunes:title: Case May Unearth Secrets of Epstein
description:
Bloomberg Legal Reporter Patricia Hurtado describes how Ghislaine Maxwell, Jeffrey Epstein's former girlfriend, has gone from a luxury estate in New Hampshire to lockdown in Brooklyn and the secrets her case may reveal. June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
